CustomField.description: This field tells you if the account is an Integration Builder Customer of any kind.
CustomField.formula: IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( IntegrationBuilder__c , "Own It"), ISPICKVAL(IntegrationBuilder__c , "Own Partial"), ISPICKVAL(IntegrationBuilder__c, "SmartLink"), ISPICKVAL(IntegrationBuilder__c , "Billing Paused")),"Integration Builder Customer","Non Integration Builder Customer")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field tells you if the account is an Integration Builder Customer of any kind.
CustomField.label: Intapp Integrate Customer Status
